Projects in Ruby

  • Slack API

    Created a Slack app that allows users to interact with Slack using command-line.

  • Hotel Booking

    Booking system for a small hotel. This system will be used by employees who manage bookings and booking data, and will not be available to the general public.

  • Rideshare

    Built a Ruby library that loads lists of passengers, trips and drivers from CSV files.

  • Grocery Store

    Grocery store system using TDD, object composition and reading data from a CSV file. This system for grocery stores is able to keep track of the orders that folks make in the store.
